thread.title: U.S. Government Bond Prices Lower Ahead of Auctions, Inflation Reports

author: Sam Goldfarb
title: U.S. Government Bond Prices Lower Ahead of Auctions, Inflation Reports

organizations.name: u.s. government bond prices lower ahead of auctions

text:
U.S. government bond prices edged lower Monday as investors looked ahead to a series of debt auctions and releases of inflation data.
The yield on the benchmark 10-year U.S. Treasury note settled at 2.950%, compared with 2.946% Friday.
Yields, which rise when bond prices fall, have barely moved in recent sessions as investors wait for more...
